• The ‘pink’ colour in this image correlates with hydrogen whereas the streaks of dark ‘purple’ of the image represents Oxygen (NASA 2005d).
  • Notice how the streaks of purple and pink are ‘ring shaped’ indicating that the gas has travelled many light-years away from their origin.
  • The bright ‘spots’ on the image are stars. Even though these stars look like they are inside with the supernova remnant, they could be millions of light years away.
